Package calculator

package calculator
  • Class
    Description
    Calculator
    Class Calculator serves the purpose of adding, subtracting, multiplying or dividing two values.
    CalculatorAdvanced
    Class Calculator serves the purpose of performing a more complex set of operations which includes factorials, exponents and checking if a number is perfect or Armstrong.
    DivisionByZeroException
    Exception class for when a number is divided by zero.
    NotSupportedOperationException
    Exception class for when a unsupported operator is provided.
    NumberNotInAreaException
    Exception class for when a number not in a defined area.
